changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, name character varying(255) NOT NULL, username varchar(255) NOT NULL, password character varying(255) NOT NULL, role character varying(20) NOT NULL, created_date timestamp without time zone NOT NULL, updated_Date timestamp without time zone NOT NULL );

changeSet.author: justinmarotta
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE todo_item ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, user_id bigint NOT NULL, item character varying(255) NOT NULL, done boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, created_date timestamp without time zone NOT NULL, updated_date timestamp without time zone NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_todo_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE )
